Entries.Introduction: Oh, that's right... I heard someone new was moving onto that old farm.#$e#It's kind of a shame, really. I always enjoyed exploring those overgrown fields by myself.$9
Entries.Resort_Entering: I hope a mermaid visits the beach.
Entries.Resort_Leaving: I'm gonna ask Willy if we can take the scenic route back.
Entries.Resort_Leaving_2: Maybe we'll see a sea monster on the way back.
Entries.Resort_Shore: The beach is okay, but it gets boring pretty quick. I'd rather check out that dark jungle, or the volcano!
Entries.Resort_Shore_2: Hmm, you think I could sneak my guinea pig onto the island?#$e#Nah, David's probably not much of a swimmer anyways.$1
Entries.Resort_Umbrella: My skin gets burnt really easily. So I'm just gonna stay under this umbrella for a while.#$e#I like it in the shade. Too much sun makes me dizzy.
Entries.Resort_Umbrella_2: Hey @, want to build a sand castle with me?#$e#Actually, a sand dungeon might be cooler!$1
Entries.Resort_Umbrella_3: Hey @, you think you could build a raft?#$e#I saw a few cool islands on the way here I want to visit.
Entries.Resort_Wander: An island this big has got to be hiding some buried treasure.#$e#Quick, get me a shovel!#$e#Relax, I'm just kidding.$1
Entries.Resort_Bar: Gus made me a dark purple refresher, to match my hair. It tastes great!$1
Entries.Resort: Bummer... Willy says we have to stay on the beach...$2#$b#And I brought my sword and everything...$2
Entries.danceRejection: That's flattering... but I'm gonna have to say no. Sorry.
Entries.divorced: What are you doing here? Just leave me alone!$5
Entries.secondChance_Girls: *sigh*... I can't stay mad at you anymore, @. Let's just move on with our lives.$2
Entries.breakUp: Oh... I... I understand. You see me as just a friend...$2#$b#I guess we weren't really a good match...$2
Entries.Event_VideoGame_Yes: Great! I'm sure you'll be able to beat this level with ease.$h
Entries.Event_VideoGame_No: Oh? *sigh*... I guess I'll never get past this level, then...$s
Entries.Event_Grave1: See? You understand why I'm out here, then.#$b#I've lived in the valley my whole life, but I've never really done anything memorable. I want to go on an adventure!$8
Entries.Event_Grave2: Sure. I don't want to kill anything, either. I just want to do a little exploring without risking my neck!#$b#I've lived in the valley my whole life, but I've never really done anything memorable. I want to go on an adventure!$8
Entries.Event_Grave3: Oh, it's because I'm a girl... isn't it? Ugh...$u^Why? I'm just as strong as you!$a#$b#I'm not some fragile princess.. I can take care of myself!$a#$b#I've lived in the valley my whole life, but I've never really done anything memorable. I want to go on an adventure!$8
Entries.Event_Grave4: Really? That's surprising.$8#$b#I've lived in the valley my whole life, but I've never really done anything memorable. I want to go on an adventure!$8
Entries.Event_Rain_2: Yeah... I guess you would be the type to enjoy this somber ambience.
Entries.Event_Tragic_1: Yeah... I guess my own life is okay...$s
Entries.Event_Tragic_3: I would feel better if I could believe that...#$b#But I don't.$s
Entries.Event_Cave_1: *sniffle* *hic* O-Okay......$4#$b#%Abigail relaxes a little bit at your reassurance.
Entries.Event_Cave_2: I guess so... *hic*#$b#*sniffle*... M-Maybe I don't have to be a big girl right now...$4
Entries.Event_Cave_3: *sniffle* Sh-shut up, dork! *giggle*... *hic*...$4.#$b#%...Abigail playfully knocks your shoulder, and wipes at her tears.
Entries.Mon: Oh, hey. Taking a break from work?
Entries.Mon2: Oh, hi!#$e#Do you ever hang out at the cemetery? It's a peaceful place to spend some time alone.
Entries.Mon8: ...Oh, @! Hi.$1#$e#Want to hang out for a while? Here! Let me read your palm. *giggle*#$e#...So, this fate line means 'prone to changes in life from external forces'...$9#$b#I sure BET you're prone to changes! *giggle*$1
Entries.Tue: Ugh... I'm not in a good mood right now.$2#$e#I said I'm not in a good mood... what do you want?$5
Entries.Tue2: ...*sigh*...$2#$e#I know my parents mean well, but they're so uptight! Weren't they ever young?
Entries.Tue6: I wonder what Mom was like when she was my age.#$e#...Well, I can't imagine she was that much like me.$1
Entries.Wed: Hey. Sorry in advance if I say anything rude. I didn't get much sleep last night.#$e#What do you want?
Entries.Wed2: Oh, hi @. Taking a break from your work?#$e#Me too. Oh! Nothing physical... just some online classes I'm taking.
Entries.Wed6: It's cool that all my classes are online this spring. I've never liked classrooms.#$e#If I get ONE more teacher that thinks it's funny to say "I don't know, caaaan you?" when I ask to go to the bathroom, I'm gonna pee on their desk like a dog.$3
Entries.Thu: #$1 Abigail1#Oh no, I think my Dad's going to cook dinner tonight...$2#$e#I don't feel like doing anything today...$3
Entries.Thu4: I'm craving something sweet... Hmm, maybe chocolate?$9#$e#I tend to snack when I'm bored.$1
Entries.Fri: Wow, I just realized it's Friday.$3#$e#Sometimes I totally lose track of time.
Entries.Fri2: We're all going to hang out in the saloon this evening. It's kind of like a friday tradition, I guess.
Entries.Fri6: The birds were happily chirping today. They're too simple to understand the future.#$e#It's better to be like them, isn't it?
Entries.Sat: The fresh mountain air is nice on a day like this.$1#$e#I wonder if the frogs will make an appearance soon.
Entries.Sat6: Hey, @. Wanna come along next time Sebastian and I go searching for frogs?#$e#Sometimes Sam joins us too, but he's such a little baby about it. He gets spooked any time one hops towards him...$9#$b#You're braver than that, right?
Entries.Sun: Oh man... I've been pushing off my homework all weekend. Looks like I'll be pulling another all-nighter...$2
Entries.Sun2: I wonder what would happen if I spent all night in the graveyard?#$q 17/18 Sun_old#@, What do you think happens to us after we die?#$r 17 0 Sun_17#I have no idea.#$r 18 40 Sun_18#We come back as spooky ghosts.#$r 17 0 Sun_17#We go to Heaven.#$r 18 0 Sun_17#Our energy bodies enter the astral plane.#$r 17 30 Sun_nothing#Nothing. We just cease to exist.
Entries.Sun_old: $p 17#I guess you think nothing would happen, right?$3|Maybe a wicked ghost would appear!
Entries.Sun_nothing: You know, that wouldn't be so bad.$8
Entries.Sun8: Sometimes, I have to sneak out of my room in the dead of the night to go wash bedsheets or pants down in the river.#$e#I still havent run across any spooky ghosts, though...$2
Entries.spring_12: I'm definitely going to enter the egg hunt tomorrow. Are you?
Entries.spring_23: Well, tomorrow is the flower dance. Dancing is alright, but they make me wear this stupid white dress...$2
Entries.summer_Mon: My pet guinea pig, David, just hates this weather.#$b#I can't say I disagree with the little guy.$1
Entries.summer_Mon4: Oof, I think you might want to consider a shower soon, @. This heat makes any smells...$1#$b#Well, let's just say they get a LOT more obvious.$4#$e#If that old farmhouse of yours doesn't have a working shower, you can use the bathhouse up north.
Entries.summer_Mon6: Extra-hot weather? Bleh. Disgusting. The absolute worst.$5#$e#...Extra-hot Spicy Eel at the Saloon tonight, on the other hand..?#$b#Now we're talking!$1
Entries.summer_Tue: The air is so thick with honey and nectar all summer. I almost feel dizzy.$3
Entries.summer_Tue8: Nngh... I don't know if it's the heat that's making my stomach upset, or if I overdid it again last night at the Saloon...$3#$e#I'm just gonna blame it on the weather. *gurgle*$1
Entries.summer_Wed: I would love to live in an old farmhouse like you.#$b#The creak of a floorboard, the slow plumes of dust whispering through the rafters... There's something special about an old building, isn't there?
Entries.summer_Wed4: Do you ever get scared living alone in that creaky old house?#$b#Pshhhh, not me! I would never.#$b#Heh heh... ha...$9
Entries.summer_Wed8: Hiya, @!$1#$e#If you ever get lonely in that spooky old house, let me know.#$b#I'm always down to have a sleepover!$1
Entries.summer_Thu: If I knew how to use a sword I would be exploring those caves by the mountain lake right now. It's probably nice and cool in there.
Entries.summer_Thu6: Hey, @! You've fought monsters before, right? Do you think you could show me some sword stances?#$b#All the ones I've seen before wouldn't really work with a diaper on...$9
Entries.summer_Thu10: Sometimes, when it's too hot, I go for a swim in that little cave-pool down in the mines.#$b#Smuggling a waterlogged diaper back up afterwards is really hard, though...$9#$e#What, you think I'm gonna take it off? Psh, fat chance!$1#$b#Getting your diaper all big and heavy is part of the fun!$4
Entries.summer_Fri: I kind of wish I had a cat. Unfortunately, my Dad is allergic to pretty much everything.
Entries.summer_Fri6: Dad searched the whole shop top-to-bottom for spoiled produce again this morning.#$e#...It drives him crazy when he can't find anything.$4#$b#%Abigail flashes a cheeky grin.
Entries.summer_Sat: I'm looking forward to fall... the cool mountain breeze, the swirling red petals, the smell of mushrooms... *sigh*
Entries.summer_Sat6: Uuuuu... I don't feel like doing anything... Summer is no fun! It's just hot and sticky and boring.$2
Entries.summer_Sun: Do you ever get an urge to go exploring, @?#$q 25/26 summer_Sun_old#Okay... pretend you just won a free vacation. Where would you go?#$r 25 0 Sun_25#The beach#$r 26 30 Sun_26#In a dark cave#$r 26 30 Sun_26#The old, gnarled forest#$r 25 0 Sun_25#Joja Mega-Mall
Entries.summer_Sun_old: $p 25#I do... but you probably wouldn't like the places I'm thinking about...|Maybe we'll be neighbors someday. I think we both have similar, weird tastes.$1
Entries.Sun_25: Huh. I think that would get old fast.
Entries.summer_Sun8: Every now and then, I try knocking on the door of that big spooky tower.#$b#It's shut tight and nobody answers me... but I can see smoke coming out of the chimney!$9#$e#If my throwing arm were better, I'd chuck a dirty diaper up into the flue. See if THAT would get their attention.$1
Entries.summer_1: Summer's here. It's really not my favorite season.$6#$e#The air is so muggy I feel like I'm floating in soup.$2
Entries.summer_6: I went to the beach last night, after dark... Sometimes you can see strange lights bobbing over the sea.#$e#Or maybe that was just a dream I had... It doesn't feel real anymore.
Entries.summer_10: Everyone's excited for the Luau tomorrow. Maybe a little nervous, too, considering the Governor will be here.
Entries.summer_27: You can't miss tomorrow's festival. It's one of the most beautiful wonders of the valley.
Entries.fall_Mon: I need to stretch my legs and get some fresh air today.
Entries.fall_Mon4: I need to stretch my legs and get some fresh air today.#$e#Oh, don't worry. It's a very loose definition of fresh!$1#$b#You can stick around if you wanna.
Entries.fall_Mon8: Y'know, after seeing how you've handled it... I could totally see myself living on a farm someday.#$e#Loads of ways to get strong for monster-fighting, plenty of fresh air...#$b#...A plausible excuse for any weird smells... *chuckle*$4
Entries.fall_Tue: $d joja#I try to help out in the shop on most days. Business has been pretty bad since the Joja Mart opened, though.|Ever since Joja Mart shut down we've been doing great at the shop!$1
Entries.fall_Tue4: I may fight with my parents a lot, but I know they're just looking out for me. They're... doing what they think is best.$2#$b#I dunno why I'm saying this to you. Don't tell anyone.$9
Entries.fall_Wed: I can't wait to see some pumpkins this year.$1#$e#The spirit's eve festival happens at the end of the season. It's pretty low-key compared to what you'd see in Zuzu City, but for a small town like this it's a lot of fun.
Entries.fall_Wed2: Are you growing pumpkins on your farm this year?#$e#Save one for me!$1
Entries.fall_Wed6: Pumpkins are the best part of the spooky season.$1#$e#You can make them into a jack-o-lantern, you can smash them into a big ol' mound of veggie-gore, you can bake them into a super delicious pie...$4#$e#...Oh, yeah, they're a great source of fiber too.$1
Entries.fall_Thu: #$1 AbigailHAND#Last night I dreamt that my left hand had turned into a gigantic %noun. Does that mean anything?#$e#%Abigail doesn't seem to be interested in talking right now.
Entries.fall_Thu6: I had a nightmare last night... Probably shouldn't have binged all those scary movies.$2#$e#I think I would've wet the bed if that dream had gone on any longer...$9
Entries.fall_Thu10: I had an interesting dream last night, with you in it.#$e#It was a good dream.$1
Entries.fall_Fri: I wish the season lasted a little longer.$2#$b#When the wind really picks up, I almost feel like a kid again.
Entries.fall_Fri4: I wish the season lasted a little longer.$8#$e#When the wind really picks up, I almost feel like a kid again...#$b#...Even more so when you're upwind, diaper boy! *giggle*$1^...Even more so when you're upwind, diaper girl! *giggle*$1
Entries.fall_Fri10: The mountain caves are so creepy this time of year.#$b#Whenever a strong wind blows down the tunnels and ventilation shafts, it sounds like spooky ghosts are wailing.$4
Entries.fall_Sat: $d cc#I can't believe you fixed up that old Community Center all by yourself. I'm really impressed.|Hey, do you have any scarecrows on your farm?
Entries.fall_Sat6: Hmm, maybe I could dress up as a scarecrow for Spirit's Eve...$9#$e#If I played my cards right, I could blend in with the props and scare people.#$e#It'd take way too much patience, though. I could never sit still long enough to be convincing.$1
Entries.fall_Sun: Hmm... what should I do tonight?#$q 27/28 fall_Sun_old#I was thinking about dyeing my hair again... what do you think?#$r 27 10 Sun_27#Dye it black.#$r 27 10 Sun_27#Why not blonde?#$r 27 20 Sun_WildColor#How about bubblegum pink?#$r 28 0 Sun_28#I like your hair just the way it is!
Entries.fall_Sun_old: $p 27#I was going to dye my hair but then I decided against it.|Yes? What is it?
Entries.Sun_27: I guess that's a pretty safe choice, huh?#$e#I'll think about it.
Entries.Sun_28: Of course that's what you'd say.$3
Entries.Sun_WildColor: You're always good for a laugh.$1
Entries.fall_Sun6: I'm gonna try and catch a horror marathon tonight after my parents fall asleep.$9#$e#I stocked up on snacks, and I also sorta-kinda nicked a couple of these from Jojamart... Here, take one!$1#$b#::120:give:Joja diaper:1::
Entries.fall_1: Ah... Fall's here!$1#$e#I was getting so tired of summer.
Entries.fall_26: Will I see you tomorrow at the Spirit's Eve festival? Look for me in the haunted maze.$1
Entries.winter_Mon: It's just too cold to go outside much.#$e#But I do enjoy building a snowgoon.$1
Entries.winter_Mon4: Y'know, it's fun to play in the snow sometimes...#$e#Just be careful about putting any in your mouth, @.$1
Entries.winter_Tue: Doesn't a steaming hot cup of cocoa sound good right now?
Entries.winter_Tue4: It's so cold, I wish we had a hot cup of cocoa to share...$1
Entries.winter_Tue8: It's so cold... We should make hot cocoa!#$e#...If I don't get some soon, I might just have to make a different kind of 'hot chocolate' to warm myself up.$4
Entries.winter_Wed: Hi. Is it boring to be a farmer during the winter?
Entries.winter_Wed2: Hi. If you're ever bored, you can always hang out in my room.#$e#As long as I'm not changing, of course!
Entries.winter_Wed6: It's so hard being sneaky all the time at home whenever winter comes around...$8#$e#I have to keep my window shut all the time for David's sake.$9#$b#Poor little guy... Guinea pigs handle cold weather even worse than I do.$1
Entries.winter_Thu: Another year is almost over.#$e#It goes by so fast, doesn't it?$2
Entries.winter_Thu8: Another year is almost over...#$e#I don't know if either of us grew up very much, though... Maybe next year?$1
Entries.winter_Fri: One thing I've learned living here... everyone stares at you if you look different.
Entries.winter_Fri6: I'm a little scared of trying to change my hair again...$8#$e#Everyone stares at it when it's like this... That makes it easier for me to keep certain other things secret.
Entries.winter_Sat: It's the weekend!#$e#Hmm... Maybe I'll stay up extra late playing video games tonight...
Entries.winter_Sat6: I still haven't beaten Journey of the Prairie King yet.#$e#I keep having... distractions... every time I manage to get a good run going.$4
Entries.winter_Sun: Oh, hello.#$q 29/30 winter_Sun_old#I made these two drawings. What do you think?#$r 29 20 Sun_29#I like the jungle island and the tiger.#$r 30 5 Sun_30#I like the orc with the battleaxe.#$r 29 -50 Sun_Bad#I don't like either of them.
Entries.winter_Sun_old: $p 29#Remember those drawings I showed you a while ago? I accidentally threw them away.$2|Remember that drawing I showed you with the orc? I entered it into an online contest and won 50g!$1
Entries.Sun_29: Oh yeah? I guess that makes sense.
Entries.Sun_30: I'm glad. It's embarrassing to share your art with others. But I think you and I are on the same page.
Entries.Sun_Bad: Rude! Why would you hurt my feelings like that? You're so insensitive!$2
Entries.winter_Sun10: I haven't drawn anything in a while. Maybe I should pick that back up?#$e#It's really hard for me to sit still when I'm drawing, though...$9#$e#I'd have to do it without a diaper on, the crinkling noise distracts me.$3#$b#...But that means taking so many breaks... *sigh*$2
Entries.winter_1: Well, fall is over...$2#$e#But I like winter, too!$1
Entries.winter_7: I wanna make a snowgoon tomorrow.
Entries.winter_24: I'm going to eat so much cranberry sauce tomorrow.$1

Entries.Indoor_Day_0: Morning, sunshine! I wanted to snuggle up in bed a little while longer, but the bathroom was calling me.#$e#Hey, don't give me that look! I still go on the toilet just as much as I go in my diapers!$1#$e#...Okay, okay! Sometimes I do both at once...$4#$b#That's called efficiency, babe. You wouldn't get it! *giggle*$1
Entries.Indoor_Day_1: Hey, @. Heading out into the wild? I got you something...[286 287 205 243 732]#$e#Use that if you get into a tough spot out there.#$e#::125:give:space diaper:3::
Entries.Indoor_Day_2: Heading to the mines? If you find something tasty, remember to bring me a piece!$1#$b#And if you find any discarded diapers down there... I don't know anything about those.#$e#%Abigail smiles at you, feigning innocence.
Entries.Indoor_Day_3: I still can't get over how I can wear diapers so openly here.#$e#It's different than being all sneaky with them... But not a bad kind of different.
Entries.Indoor_Day_4: %You spot Abigail absent-mindedly nibbling on a small chunk of amethyst from her rock collection.#$b#%Before she hurts her teeth, you hand her one of those rubbery little chewy-necklaces she sometimes wears.#$b#Oh... whoops. Thanks @!$1
Entries.Indoor_Day_Abigail: %Abigail is dancing around to energetic music while she cleans the floor, belting lyrics into the mop handle like it's a microphone.#$e#%You briefly get lost in the performance...#$b#%...Until Abby pushes way too hard on a long scream, which makes her bend double and push out a big messy blowout.#$b#...Aw, no! Come on!! I was almost done here!!$7 [TRIGGER]
Entries.Indoor_Night_0: Hey, babe. Tired from a hard day's work?#$b#Here, I got you this special "muscle relaxant"... Maybe it'll help.[351]$1#$e#%Abigail is trying very hard not to giggle.
Entries.Indoor_Night_1: Hey. Bedtime soon?#$b#It's harder to sleep without you there next to me.$2#$e#And I get cold, too! You leak in bed so much that I can't use my old electric blanket!$1#$b#...But that's fine, you're a better heater than that old thing ever was.$4
Entries.Indoor_Night_2: I felt like making some soup for dinner. I hope it's not too disgusting. [199 218 219 727 730]$1
Entries.Indoor_Night_3: Sometimes I get this overwhelming urge to climb up onto the roof with a nice warm blanket and just... watch the moon drift across the sky all night.#$b#I know, I know... The roof probably isn't built to handle our weight...$9#$e#Think of it this way, though! We'd still have "toilets" up there at least! *giggle*$1
Entries.Indoor_Night_4: Hey, @? If you ever have a nightmare, just think about me!#$b#I'll come to slay all your dream-monsters!$1#$e#...S-sometimes I gotta do the same with you...$9#$b#...But it works every time!$4
Entries.Indoor_Night_Abigail: *yawn* I'm ready to call it a night pretty soon.$1#$b#How about you? Need to do anything in particular before you're ready for bed?$4#$e#$y 'Abigail gives you a teasing grin._...Could you give me a change?_Of course, babe.*::123:change:space diaper:1::_I gotta go to the potty..._Oh? Well then, let me help you with that!$4*%Abigail catches you in a tight embrace and presses down on your stomach.[TRIGGER]*There! All better now, cutie? Heehee!$1_Nope, I'm all good too!_I'm sure you are, cutie.$1*Just don't stay up too late, or you'll miss out on all the cuddles.$4'
Entries.Rainy_Day_0: *sigh* I wish we'd get some thick fog here in the valley for once...$9#$b#I would love to lurk around in the swirling, hazy mists, and pop out at random unsuspecting passersby.
Entries.Rainy_Day_1: I don't bother with umbrellas when the weather gets like this.#$b#It's more fun to dance around in the rain!$1
Entries.Rainy_Day_2: The gloom... the rain... this is the perfect kind of weather.$4
Entries.Rainy_Day_3: Oh, wow. Do you see that? There's something weird in the rain.#$e#%You try to see what she's pointing at, barely noticing Abby's face scrunching up in the window's reflection before her diaper suddenly bulges out noisily.#$b#*giggle* Gotcha! Sorry-not-sorry!$1 [TRIGGER]
Entries.Rainy_Day_4: *sigh* It's so peaceful when it pours like this...$4#$b#%You look out at the storm together. Abby blushes when the muffled patter of raindrops gets suspiciously louder. [TRIGGER]
Entries.Rainy_Day_Abigail: Good morning, sleepyhead!$1#$b#$y 'I'm grabbing something to drink with breakfast. Want anything?_Milk, please!_Hehe. How did I know? Here you are, cutie.[184]$1*Personally, I prefer chocolate milk though._Coffee._Awh, is somebody grumpy? Don't worry, I'd already made a pot for myself.[395]$1*Be warned, though... I take mine pretty strong, so it's probably gonna go right through you.$4_Tea would be nice._Yeah, it's good weather for a warm drink.[614]*Well, it's definitely not Mom's, but I hope I still did alright with it.$1'
Entries.Rainy_Night_0: I was just gazing out into the rainswept woods... I swear I saw something darker than black shifting around the trees.$6#$b#%Abigail pulls her blankie tighter around herself for safety.
Entries.Rainy_Night_1: It's a good night to see a ghost...$4#$e#%Abigail squirms in her cute cotton pajamas for a while as she looks out the window before she realizes just how badly she needs to go potty and runs to the bathroom.#$b#%...Your face heats up when you imagine how much easier it'd be for her to fail those close calls, if you could just get her into wearing onesies...
Entries.Rainy_Night_2: Looks like you got pretty soggy out there today. Bet you could use a change.#$e#...Oh? What are you blushing for, @?#$b#Why, I was only talking about your rain-soaked clothes! What else could I possibly have meant, hmm? *giggle*$4
Entries.Rainy_Night_3: %Abigail tugs at your sleeve.#$b#...Hey, @? ...Could you leave the lights on tonight?$8#$b#I, um... kind of played that scary game again... the one with the creepy, dark, endless house...$2#$e#%Abigail follows closely behind you as you flick on all of the night-lights. She only lets out a sigh of relief once the whole house is softly alight with a soft lavender glow.#$b#T-thanks, babe.$4
Entries.Rainy_Night_4: It's the perfect weather to watch some scary movies with you...#$b#We could cuddle up under the blankets together!$4#$e#I'm gonna$1
Entries.Rainy_Night_Abigail: ...$9#$b#%Abigail is intently chewing on her little silicone pendant.#$e#%She's very adamant about the fact that it was made for grown-ups -- but you still think it's basically just a pacifier with extra steps.#$b#%Or maybe she's teething? If that's the case, maybe gemstones really will be part of her diet..!#$e#Wha' arw'-- *pleh* --...What are you thinking about over there, @?$1
Entries.spouseRoom_Abigail: #$c .5#I got up a little before you and fed David Jr. He's very active this morning.#$e#I hope you don't mind the guinea pig smell.#$e#%You don't think guinea pigs tend to have a "smell" to them.#$b#%...But you know from experience that purple-haired girls named Abigail usually do.
Entries.Outdoor_0: It's awesome to be able to explore around the farm any time I want. Now I don't have to be so sneaky with stashing changes around!#$e#...Sometimes I still stumble across one of my old used diapers lying half-buried in the dirt. *chuckle*$1
Entries.Outdoor_1: Hmm. I can't tell if that's a manure-stink that I'm picking up on you or if you're the true culprit.#$e#Well... either way, I'm sure you did a very good job! *giggle*$1#$b#%Abby gives you a patronizing little head-pat.
Entries.Outdoor_2: %Abigail is intensely focused on scratching something into the mucky ground with a big long stick.#$b#I got bored of staying inside, but I don't wanna go into town today...$9#$b#So, I'm drawing a Mud-@!#$e#%You suppose you can see the resemblance... but she got your nose all wrong.
Entries.Outdoor_3: Sometimes I see bones out in the woods beyond the farm.#$b#...I can't always tell what kind of animal they belong to, though.$3#$e#...There's nothing quite like a good ominous skeleton! *giggle*$1
Entries.Outdoor_4: *rumble* Huh. I thought I'd just eaten recently...#$b#Aw, man, I always forget to put some snacks in my pocket...$2#$e#*grumble* *gurgle* A-ah! W-Wait!$7#$b#%Abigail bends over and clutches her stomach with a gasp. You hear a loud bubbly "Blort!" under her jeans.#$b#A-Ah...$1#$b#That was... not a hungry rumble...$4 [TRIGGER]
Entries.Outdoor_Abigail: $c 0.5#I saw a weird bug out here! I wanted to show you, but it skittered away too quick...#%Abigail is huddled up and crying on the ground. Her jeans are totally soaked through.#$b#A h-huge s-spider dropped on me... *sniffle*$2#$e#%You kneel down and give her a gentle hug until she stops trembling, telling her she was so brave for facing the big scary spider.#$b#%Eventually, Abigail sniffles and climbs up to her feet with an embarassingly loud squelch. She briefly glances down at her soaked jeans, appearantly deciding to deal with that later.#$b#Yeah... I-I'm okay...$8#$b#Um... *exhale* Thanks for that, @. I... I think I'll be alright now.
Entries.funLeave_Abigail: I'm going in to town today. I need to stretch these legs a bit.#$b#I think we know what happens when you don't exercise a muscle. *wink*
Entries.funReturn_Abigail: Aww, did you miss me while I was gone?#$b#Hmmm... Well, maaaaybe....$9#$b#Alright, yes, I missed you too.$1#$b#%Abigail flicks your nose playfully.#$b#The real question is, did your diaper miss me?$1
Entries.OneKid_3: I don't know how we're gonna potty train our kid if we can't even potty train you.$9#$e#Joking, joking. I have full faith... in %kid1.$1#$e#...Yeah, yeah, and you're perfect just the way you are too, ya big dork.$4#$e#Love you, babe.#$b#%Abigail sticks her tongue out at you playfully.
Entries.TwoKids_0: If you told my Dad I was gonna be the "most mature" person in the household when I got married, he'd call you a liar.#$b#But I say that winner by technicality is still winning!$1
Entries.TwoKids_2: I took the kids out for a little fresh air this morning.#$b#Probably should've woken you up to join us... The house could use a moment to vent out every now and then.$1#$b#%Abigail gives you a cheeky smile
Entries.TwoKids_3: %kid2 takes after my rebellious nature so much. Now I know how Mom felt.$1#$e#Every time I have to put on my "mom voice", it makes me feel like I'm in some kinda mirror-world.$9#$b#...It really does make me wonder what she was like before I came along.$1
Entries.Good_1: %Abigail is packing cave supplies.#$b#Flashlight, check. Rope... check. Diapers? Plenty. Now, the snacks...#$e#%You watch as Abigail carefully takes a bar of chocolate laxatives, swaps the wrapper, and sets it in the pack with a couple of regular chocolate bars.#$b#There! ...It's more fun when you don't know it's coming 'til it's too late. *giggle*$1
Entries.Good_2: I tuned in to Welwick's show this morning. My horoscope today is great!#$e#One of the commercials made my head feel kinda funny though...$2#$b#I guess I must've dozed off for a moment while it was airing. I woke up with a soggy diaper right as it ended!$1#$e#I didn't even get to see what they were selling.$9#$b#Oh well... Guess I'll just have to catch it next time.$1
Entries.Good_3: I can't even remember the last time I dyed my hair. Maybe it's been permanently stained like this...#$e#That's the reason why I don't wear blue jeans anymore. *giggle*$1
Entries.Good_4: Hey, @, need a diaper change?#$e#%...You notice Abigail is eyeing the diaper pail, with devious intent written all over her face...#$b#Does it have to be a clean change? *giggle*$1#$e#Hey, c'mon. What's the matter? Recycling is "good for the planet", isn't that right?$4
Entries.Good_5: I was just admiring the mermaid's pendant you gave me... I'll proudly wear this to my grave.$4
Entries.Good_6: Be careful out there, monsters are lurking around every corner...#$b#It's a good thing you're strong enough to handle them.#$e#...All of them except for... the snuggle monster! *cackle*$1#$b#%Abigail tackles you into a big crinkly hug.
Entries.Good_7: Psst, hey, @...$9#$b#...@!#$b#%Abigail leans in close, like she's about to tell you a big secret.#$b#You're my favorite.$4
Entries.Neutral_0: I hope you'll still like me when I'm old and wrinkly.$8#$b#At least we might still be young at heart, if that time ever comes to pass!$1
Entries.Neutral_1: That lullaby you sometimes hum to yourself got stuck in my head again...$1#$b#Maybe I should learn it on the flute someday?
Entries.Neutral_6: I wonder how the old shop is doing? I should visit my parents again soon.#$b#...Probably buy some new underpants too.$1#$e#Hey, I wonder... Do you think I could stretch a pair of big girl undies OVER my diaper? *giggle*$1
Entries.Neutral_7: That spooky shrine your Grandpa left behind is so cool. I bet it's super-duper haunted!$1#$b#Oh, gosh... hopefully his ghost hasn't been watching us too closely if it is.$4
Entries.Neutral_8: I swear I just cleaned out the diaper pail the other day! How is it this full again?$9#$e#%Abigail stops, looks at you, then down at her own hips, before she laughs a musical little laugh.#$b#...Okay, nevermind, I do know how.$1#$b#...It's still unfair, though!$1
Entries.Neutral_9: Bluhh. I feel so lazy today, I might just binge some video games...#$b#It's nice being able to skip all the potty breaks, at least.
Entries.Bad_7: I used to be something special to you. Your best friend, your partner in crime... Now you only seem to put up with me for the hot dinners and changes.$s
Entries.Bad_8: I just don't get why you've been giving me the cold shoulder lately...$3#$b#Be a big boy and use your words, @.$2^Be a big girl and use your words, @.$2
Entries.Bad_9: This tension that's built up between us is gonna fester if we don't talk about it.$3#$b#It's like a dirty diaper... If you keep ignoring it, it's gonna blow up.$3
Entries.spring_1: So... any big plans for the new year?#$b#Hmm, I'm guessing 'graduate from potty-training' is a poor bet? *giggle*$1
Entries.spring_2: Blegh. Spring is the second worst season. It's like the Monday of the year.$5#$b#It's not spooky, there's hardly anything fun... The quiet months make me feel all antsy and restless.$3#$e#...I wanna go vandalize Mayor Lewis's stupid truck.$3
Entries.spring_4: Oh, it's time for my annual check-up today... probably gonna get another embarassing lecture on my weak pelvic floor muscles...$2#$e#I mean... I won't lie, total incontinence could be a cute look on me...$9#$b#...But I wanna prove Dr. Harvey wrong for as long as I can first! This is a matter of spite!$3#$e#%There's a fiery determination in Abby's eyes.
Entries.spring_12: Hey, the egg festival is tomorrow! Sorry, but I won't go easy on you just because we're married!$1#$e#I plan on winning that egg hunt. So, go ahead, just try to beat me!#$b#%Abigail flashes you her sharpest smile.
Entries.spring_23: The flower dance is tomorrow...#$b#It's probably a good thing nobody makes you dress up for these.$1#$b#Those suits usually have pretty snug inseams. I don't think there'd be much room for a diaper. *giggle*$1^White dresses are... hard to clean, if something happened. *giggle*$1
Entries.spring_25: Oh right, it's Dad's birthday tomorrow...#$e#I guess I'll probably pick him a couple daffodils on my way to the store, and wish him a happy birthday.#$b#He's... kinda hard to shop for.$9
Entries.summer_1: Yuck, it's summer. The actual worst time of year.$5#$b#At least in Spring I'm just bored. Now I'm boiling in my skin too.$9
Entries.summer_4: Hehe. Hiii, @.$1#$b#%Abigail seems a bit... floppy?#$e#I didn't sleep too well last night, and when I got up, the heat went right to my head.$4#$b#...Don't worryyy, I'm drinkin' lotsa water! See??$1#$b#%Abigail pulls down her jeans, and proudly demonstrates just how "well hydrated" she is right into her diaper. [TRIGGER]#$e#%...After changing Abby's flooded pampers, you drape a cold washcloth around her neck and tell her she needs to go cool off.#$b#...Mmm, fine... But only cause I wanna!$4
Entries.summer_7: *giggle* I just remembered today was the anniversary of the Bathhouse Incident.$1#$e#The swimsuit may be long gone, but somehow my locker STILL smells like poop.$1#$b#It probably needs industrial-strength cleaning supplies or something at this point.#$e#...Maybe a necromancer.$1
Entries.summer_12: Um... sorry about the smell. I was sweating all night in the heat...$2#$e#Okay, okay! I also soiled my pajamas too... and it might've been a little bit on purpose...$9#$e#The sweat's worse though. I don't have a tolerance for it.$2
Entries.summer_18: Ugh, how much more summer can there be? I feel all itchy and restless.$2#$e#...I don't know if I need to go break something, or if this is just some kinda full-body heat rash.$3
Entries.summer_23: %Abigail seems to have given up on pants today; only a plain white diaper hangs around her hips, very swollen and saturated.#$b#Bluhhh. I don't feel like being a big girl today... It's like, a MILLION degrees out there.$2 [TRIGGER]#$e#%You insist on giving your wife a much-needed diaper change and some water before she's allowed to continue melting into the ground.
Entries.summer_28: %Abigail is pacing back and forth, and bouncing on her feet occasionally.#$b#It's almost time! Ugh, I'm so ready for this summer to finally be over!$1
Entries.fall_1: *sniff* Ahhh, fall! The scent is unmistakable! Mushrooms, rotting leaves, pumpkin... Isn't it lovely?$1#$e#Mmm, I really wanna add another smell to that list... but I'll be a good role model and use the toilet.#$b#C'mon, @, I don't have the time for a big messy clean-up, there's fall activities to do!!!$1
Entries.fall_2: Aaagh, I'm so, so, SO excited! The pumpkins, the crunchy leaves, the Spirit's Eve decorations...$1#$b#The spooky movies... *giggle*$4#$e#%Abigail blushes hard, but her face is beaming with unrestrained joy.
Entries.fall_8: I'm in a really great mood today.#$b#I even got up a little early to bake you something special.[220 608 611]$4#$e#...Don't think I'm going TOTALLY soft on you though, alright?#$b#Last I checked, my attitude is still there - and I donâ€™t plan on changing that.$1
Entries.fall_16: It's been a weird autumn...#$b#My favorite kind! *chuckle*$1
Entries.fall_26: Spirit's Eve is tomorrow!!!$1#$e#Don't feel bad if the maze is too scary for you. We wouldn't want you having an accident, would we? ...Well, maybe we would. *giggle*$1
Entries.fall_28: Fall's almost over...$2#$e#Hey, I taped a bunch of brand-new horror movies, can we watch them in bed tonight? Might as well send the season off on a high note.#$e#Hehe, yes!! You're the best! I'll make sure we have some towels laid out. *giggle*$1#$b#::120:give:space diaper:1::
Entries.winter_1: Mmh, I forgot how cozy it was to curl up in bed for the first snow of the year.$4#$b#Maybe I won't let you climb out of bed quite so easily tomorrow.$1#$e#%Abigail flashes a dangerous grin at you.
Entries.winter_2: Brr... I like winter, but I'm not built for cold weather.$8#$e#Oh, it's not a big deal. That just means I have a reason to warm up.$1#$e#%You hear a muffled hissing noise...#$b#%Abigail is furiously blushing through a mischievous grin.
Entries.winter_7: Hey, if you see my mom today, tell her happy birthday!#$e#Ungh... I'll have to see her tomorrow instead...#$b#I think I ate something bad on Friday, 'cuz my stomach is staging a full mutiny on me today. *gurgle*$2#$b#I've barely made it to the toilet twice since bedtime last night already... and didn't even try to make it once... *blush*$9#$e#*sigh* She'd probably believe me if I "borrowed" "your" diapers as a "one-time precaution" for this food poisoning... but I don't wanna lie to Mom on her birthday.$2
Entries.winter_15: Oh, hey! The night market's in town!#$b#I love the deep-sea tours, it's so creepy and quiet down there.$4#$e#...Just try not to stink up the cabin too bad if you go too, alright? It'll be a loooong, awkward ride back up. *chuckle*$1#$e#::125:give:space diaper:2::
Entries.winter_24: Happy Winter Star's Eve, @!$4#$e#Oh right! I was at Robin's place yesterday, she asked me to give this to you.[220]#$b#I maaaay have stolen a bite. *giggle*$1
Entries.winter_28: The year is almost over. I'm kinda dreading the slow, sunny months.$9#$b#...But I'll be sharing them with you. So, it won't be that bad.$4
Entries.spring_Abigail: *sigh* Bored, bored, bored...$6#$b#%...Abigail looks your way, and smiles dangerously.#$e#%Before you have time to escape, she catches you in a hold and tickles your tummy mercilessly. [TRIGGER]#$b#%...Your bladder gives up long before she does.#$e#*giggle* Not so bored now.
Entries.summer_Abigail: I think there's a stinkbug in the house. They come out this time of year...$3#$e#%You briefly search for the elusive insect, but then Abigail giggles and tugs out her waistband. You're hit by the stench.#$b#Gotcha! The stinkbug is me! *giggle*$1 [TRIGGER]
Entries.fall_Abigail: I went out for a walk in the woods before sunrise.#$e#It was all hazy and eerie... I heard so many cool weird creepy noises out there!#$b#I got that fluttery feeling in my guts every time it happened, like right before you go down a big rollercoaster... It was the best.$4
Entries.winter_Abigail: %Abigail clings onto you.#$b#Gimme a hug, @. I'm cold.$4#$b#$y '...I'm not letting go until you do it._(Give her a gentle hug)_Mmm. You're like a space-heater, @.$4*...Must be your super-speedy metabolism at work again.$1_(Squeeze her in a big tight bear-hug)_%Abigail gasps in surprise as soon as her feet come off the ground. Then, you hear a loud squelchy explosion and a long muffled hiss.*Those... were underpants, @.$4*Ah, whatever, you made your choice, now you're the one who's gotta put up with me being all stinky -- 'cuz this pair's not coming off while it's warm!$1 [TRIGGER]'

Entries.AbigailInMineFlute: %Abigail is lost in her music...#$b#%...Maybe a bit too lost. Pee-yew!
Entries.AbigailInMineFirst: Hey, @. Surprised? ...I finally found the courage to come down here.#$b#I felt scared at first, but I pushed through!#$b#I feel much more confident now. This is actually really fun!$1
Entries.AbigailInMine0: %Abigail looks to be taking a short rest in this safe-zone.#$b#%...Her thumb has found its way into her mouth in her sleep, and her backside is quite visibly cushioned... by more than just padding.#$e#%You decide not to wake her up yet. She looks like she's having a good dream.
Entries.AbigailInMine1: Eep!$7#$b#Hahah! You scared me! I didn't expect to see another person down here!$1#$e#You're lucky I just went potty a couple floors ago, you big meanie.#$b#I would've made you change me if you'd done that when I still had a full tank!$1
Entries.AbigailInMine2: Hi, @! I managed to sneak down this far without running into any monsters.
Entries.AbigailInMine3: Hey! It's a relief to see you down here...#$e#Oh, do you need a change? I think I might be almost out.$9#$b#...Unless you'd take fill-me-downs? *giggle*$1
Entries.AbigailInMine4: Hey! Exploring the mines on a rainy day, huh? Me too!$1
